attributes.review: This app was a bad movie from the start. From the soggy fries to the rotten burger, I never knew what to expect. After that, the peacock in the parking lot stole my car, unbelievable!!! After that, I woke up to a broken umbrella. The umbrella was faulty and disnt hold up against the wind. 0/10 if I could. Useless app!!!
